item.title: CVE-2023-5988|2024-08-02T08:14:25.145Z -- uyumsoft%20information%20system%20and%20technologies -- lioxerp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Uyumsoft Information System and Technologies LioXERP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects LioXERP: before v.146.

item.title: CVE-2023-5989|2024-08-02T08:14:25.133Z -- uyumsoft%20information%20system%20and%20technologies -- lioxerp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Uyumsoft Information System and Technologies LioXERP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects LioXERP: before v.146.
